name: spheres
description:
"Plot"

You think you are a triangle shooting rectangles at circles,
but then your life changes forever when you realize
that you actually are a cone shooting cuboids at spheres.

Mechanics

Perspective shift

By pressing space you can flip your perspective
around 90°. The position of an object on the axis
you currently can't see is represented by it's color.


Slow motion

Holding the space bare down allows you to
slowdown time. But doing so drains the bar
to your left. It gets refilled faster the faster
you move.


Combine your abilities

If you are smart about using those mechanics
together they give you an even bigger advantage.

Controls

A/D----------------------- Rotate
L-------------------------- Shoot
K-------------------------- Thrust
Space-------------------- Rotate Space
Hold Space------------- Slow Motion

Credits

Developer: Peter Jaschkowske(@P_Jaschkowske)
